Key Arguments: The bill is seen as dangerous, unlawful, and unconstitutional.
The government is accused of spreading misinformation and disinformation, particularly regarding COVID-19 and vaccines.
The bill is perceived as a tool to protect the government and elites from scrutiny and to censor free speech.
The bill is viewed as unnecessary, as the public can discern misinformation without government intervention.
